directions.step:
1. USE 1 LB 12 OZ (1/2-NO. 10 CN) CANNED, SLICED APPLE PIE FILLING MIX. BREAK APPLES INTO 1 INCH PIECES. PREPARE ACCORDING TO DIRECTIONS ON CONTAINER.
Recipe Number: D00302
SERVING SIZE: 2 TBS
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
